text:
Dev.xyz | Santa Monica, CA | Full-Time, Onsite | https://dev.xyz

Dev.xyz is a privately funded development company that manages over 100 websites around the internet. Our team is a tight-knit group of designers and developers who are passionate about what we do. We provide the digital needs of entities within our parent company and do not serve outside clients.

To learn more about who we are, our engineering culture, and whether this is the right place for you, read our Key Values profile: https://www.keyvalues.com/dev-xyz

Here are our open roles:

- Back End Developer: https://xyz.bamboohr.com/jobs/view.php?id=19

- Full-Stack Developer: https://xyz.bamboohr.com/jobs/view.php?id=15

Tech Stack: LAMP / LEMP, Laravel / Zend, Node.js, AWS, Redis / Memcache, Ubuntu / CentOS, MySQL / Mongo, VanillaJS, VueJS, HTML5 / CSS3, Angular / Backbone / Ember / Ionic
